Talk: ^Jake` I used to think this sort of place was an escape from the real world.
^(Wait, I'm confused. How many times have you been here?)

c-0: ^Jake` I couldn't give you a specific number, but I've come here for years.
^Jake` Working in a lab is exhausting, especially in my field.
^Jake` I'm supposed to be working on the cutting-edge of medicine, and even when we make something that works, these medical safety people say 'no.'
^Jake` And ever time they do, I think about all the people that could die because of their decision.
^Jake` When I com here, the last thing I want to think about is death.

c-1: ^Player` I have nothing to ask him right now...

EvidenceA: ^Jake` Oh! That's a real shame. Do you know who did it?

c-0: ^Jake` Nah. I can barely manage handling my own keys. I don't pay attention to anyone else's keys.
